title: OLFA Perforation Cutter 28 235B
description: ・ You can make perforations in paper, film, vinyl, etc. that can be cut 　off when necessary. ・ For ticket making and paper craft ・ We can change blade with one touch ・ Specification: Replaceable blade type, for both left and right (if left-　handed person can 　also be used), 　Good Design Award ・ Replacement blade: Perforation rotary 28 (perforation cutter 28) 　　replacement blade, 　Circular blade 28 mm
